name: Arcane Legerdemain
prereq: Trained in Thievery, ability to cast the Mage Hand cantrip
description: You have honed your skills with Mage Hand to enable fine manipulation of small objects. You can use the Mage Hand cantrip to attempt to Pick a Lock or Disable a Device, adding your spellcasting ability modifier to your Thievery check instead of your Dexterity modifier.
